message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about viewing celestial bodies. To see celestial bodies clearly, one would use a lengthened glass tube, also known as a telescope. Telescopes help magnify and focus the light coming from celestial objects, allowing us to see them in more detail. Option (A) is incorrect because a freshly printed magazine would not help in viewing celestial bodies. Option (B) is incorrect because a dirty old sneaker has no relevance to viewing celestial bodies. Option (C) is incorrect because a paper towel tube would not provide the necessary magnification.

Option (C) is incorrect because a paper towel tube is also not a tool for viewing celestial bodies.
